description: San Francisco is a cultural and commercial hub known for its steep hills, iconic landmarks like the Golden Gate Bridge, diverse neighborhoods, and innovative tech scene.

climate.note: Microclimates vary greatly across the city

topAttractions.name: Golden Gate Bridge
topAttractions.description: World-famous 1.7-mile suspension bridge connecting SF to Marin County

topAttractions.name: Alcatraz Island
topAttractions.description: Former federal prison on island in San Francisco Bay

topAttractions.name: Fisherman's Wharf & Pier 39
topAttractions.description: Tourist waterfront area with shops, restaurants, and sea lions

topAttractions.name: Lombard Street
topAttractions.description: The 'crookedest street in the world' with eight hairpin turns

neighborhoods.name: Chinatown
neighborhoods.description: Largest Chinatown outside of Asia with authentic shops and restaurants

neighborhoods.name: Mission District
neighborhoods.description: Vibrant Latino neighborhood famous for murals and burritos

neighborhoods.name: Castro District
neighborhoods.description: Historic LGBTQ+ neighborhood with rainbow crosswalks

foodScene.michelinStars: More Michelin-starred restaurants per capita than anywhere except Tokyo
foodScene.foodTrucks: Off the Grid events throughout the city

transportation.publicTransit: Muni buses, light rail, and cable cars
transportation.cableCars: Historic transit and tourist attraction - $8 per ride
transportation.bart: BART connects to East Bay and Peninsula
transportation.biking: Bay Wheels bike share, many bike lanes

outdoorActivities: Golden Gate Park (larger than Central Park)

museums.name: San Francisco Museum of Modern Art (SFMOMA)
California Academy of Sciences
museums.type: Natural history with planetarium and aquarium

tips: Dress in layers - weather changes quickly
Summer is actually the coldest season
Public transportation is extensive but can be slow
Steep hills everywhere - wear comfortable shoes
Fog often rolls in during afternoons
Homeless population is visible - be aware but compassionate

budgetGuideline.note: One of the most expensive cities in the US - budget accordingly

safety.general: Generally safe in tourist areas during the day
safety.avoid: Tenderloin, parts of SOMA, and isolated areas at night
tips: Don't leave items visible in cars
